Title Adoration of the Magi. Leaf from a manuscript Book of Hours
Artist Master of the Calendar of the Hours of Aurillac, ms. 2
Date About 1430-1440
Location France, Normandy (Bayeux or Coutances)
Language Latin
Full description Manuscript leaf from a Book of Hours for the use of Bayeux, the same as MS 96 and MBAM 1962.1954
Description source Notice 9
Current location including call number MS 95. Rare Books and Special Collections, McGill University Library
